name: Élan Vital
description:
15 years ago, deep within the Amazon rainforest, a team of archaeologists discovered an ancient temple belonging to an unknown civilization.

Dwelling inside lies an artifact of mysterious power as well as a series of messages in an unknown language.

An exciting discovery at the time soon leads to the downfall of society as we know it.
Years later a man by the name of Liam decides to step up and uncover the truth behind the events that have befallen the world.

Will he be able to uncover the truth that has eluded society since the incident?
